intradyn.cv.config
Class FileSystems

java.lang.Object
  intradyn.cv.config.FileSystems

public class FileSystems
extends Object

Class of methods for mounting, unmounting, and deletion of content on remote shares used for remote backup.

Since:
0.3.0
Author:
bkett

Constructor Summary
FileSystems()

static Boolean clean(org.ini4j.Profile.Section fileSystem)
          Deletes all files on the remote share of the specified type in remote-backup-settings.ini.

          Unmounts a remote share of the specified type in remote-backup-settings.ini.

Constructor Detail

FileSystems

public FileSystems()
Method Detail

windowsMount

public static Boolean windowsMount(org.ini4j.Profile.Section fileSystem)
Mounts a remote share of the specified type in remote-backup-settings.ini. Windows only. Requires Net.exe to be installed on the machine. NFS shares can only be mounted if the NFS tools are installed on the machine. This requires Windows 7 Enterprise or Better.

Parameters:
fileSystem -
Returns:
True if the share is successfully mounted.

windowsUMount

public static Boolean windowsUMount(org.ini4j.Profile.Section fileSystem)
Unmounts a remote share of the specified type in remote-backup-settings.ini. Windows only. Requires Net.exe to be installed on the machine.

Parameters:
fileSystem -
Returns:
True if the share is successfully unmounted.

clean

public static Boolean clean(org.ini4j.Profile.Section fileSystem)
Deletes all files on the remote share of the specified type in remote-backup-settings.ini.

Parameters:
fileSystem -
Returns:
True if all files and folders were successfully deleted.
